duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure the accuracy of quotes and orders for standard, mid-level and more complex deals.
Provide reports and analysis to sales management.
Review and edit sales contracts within defined guidelines.
Help to accelerate deal velocity and to close and increase win rate.
Administer deal registration process, including sales team contributions.
Add value by identifying and suggesting possible resolution in system gaps and processes to better streamline efficient workflow and enhance sales productivity.

education_certification.credential: 3-5 years’ experience in a Deal Desk function working with pricing, quoting, CRM, deal structuring and contracting for B2B SaaS companies.
Experience with NetSuite, Salesforce, IronClad and related systems is a plus.
Self-motivated critical thinker with strong customer service orientation, empathy, and a team player.
Excellent communication skills and ability to prioritize during times of high volume.
Ability to work well with all levels of management and cross-functional organizations.
Ability to set priorities, meet deadlines and manage multiple projects in a fast-paced changing environment.
